comments.body: Nit: errors above and below have no terminating period, nor do the builtin python error messages.
My memory of this is that it doesn't actually work, because this rst isn't read until the first pass of autosummary, and there is no recursion so the `polynomial` entry here is never visited.
Thanks for the heads up - it's building fine for me with sphinx version 2.4.3 though perhaps that's too new

A bit more follow-up: I built the docs with sphinx v2.2.0, which is the minimum required in `conf.py`. The build doesn't complain and the result appears to render properly. I've published the results of running `make html` w/ sphinx 2.2.0 on commit 9bb6a51f9 to [the gh-pages of my fork](https://rossbar.github.io/numpy/reference/routines.polynomials.polynomial.html) so that the results can be more easily compared with the current docs.
